channel.title: problemsolving on Learning is a lifelong journey, best traveled with an open mind and a curious heart.
channel.description: Recent content in problemsolving on Learning is a lifelong journey, best traveled with an open mind and a curious heart.

item.title: One Problem at a Time
item.description: Last week I had a small accident that left me hindered for a few days as I was recovering, and due to the nature of the injury, I had to lie down on my side. I took this time to catch up on reading and watched some TV as wasn’t really in a position to do much more over the weekend. While all this was happening, I was thinking to myself; I don’t need this, I have enough problems that I need to sort out.
